message_1: Suppose we have the function f(x) = x^2 + 3x - 2. If we want to find the type of f, what is the dependent type of f(x)?
message_2: The dependent type of the function f(x) = x^2 + 3x - 2 is a quadratic function. This is because the highest degree of the polynomial is 2 (x^2 term), which makes it a quadratic function.
